text: Choe Mi-Gyong (born January 1, 1991) is a North Korean football player that plays for the North Korea women's national football team and Rimyongsu Sports Club. She played in the 2012 Summer Olympics, and was known as being the only player to receive a red card in the women's tournament. == References == Category:North Korean footballers Category:1991 births Category:Living people
title: Choe Mi-Gyong
